description: The fish were found in a river in north-eastern France and some 14 species have been affected.
title: Nestl¨¦ sued over tonnes of dead fish in French river
title_page: Nestl¨¦ sued over tonnes of dead fish in French river - BBC News
maintext: "As soon as we learned of the report on Sunday at 23:00 (21:00 GMT), we immediately stopped production and put an end to the spill," factory director Tony do Rio said in a statement quoted by the Franceinfo website on Wednesday.
